ygData.messageBody:
I agree, once the situation is irrecoverable, the casters are free to
gate in my opinion. I saw a post from Abashi where he said he did not
mem gate when grouping with warriors... go figure.

Once ZONE is called i think everyone should make their BEST way out.

BTW, i'd say 90% of my deaths are from this scenario. Group calls ZONE,
everyone runs and some gate. I hit selo's and start to run, only to heal
HELP me from some unsowed partner, i circle back to pick them up, they
get selo's and make it out, i attract mob and die.

Uldar Ulfangson,
36th bard, Rodcet Nife

> On Tue, 11 Jan 2000, Dave Gaines wrote:
> >
> > If the casters in your group gate out and leave you to
> > die, they are not good groupies.
>
> What are they supposed to do - stay and die with you?
>
> If a caster gates out before the call to "ZONE!" is made, then
> I agree they're not good groupies. But once the call is made,
> for me it becomes a problem of "how do we get out of this
> situation with the fewest number of deaths." Just about all
> permutations of solutions to that problem involve the casters
> gating out ASAP.
>
> --
> John H. Kim
> kim@...
